rule.condition: not (same(balance in $L.file, NULL)) and balance in $L.file>0
rule.conditionDesc: ( balance in CurrentRecord != NULL AND balance in CurrentRecord > 0)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Balance">balance</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="number">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Balance">balance</FieldName></operand><Comparison>gt</Comparison><Value dataType="number">0</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( balance in CurrentRecord != NULL AND balance in CurrentRecord > 0))
